title: Sei Shoujo Sentai Lakers EX (Battle Team Lakers EX)
synopsis: A group of alien girls from planet Blade Star come to earth after their home planet got destroyed. They all have powerful Super-Lake Crystals that allow them to transform into superheroines. led by Blade Knight, they must fight Oleana, an evil space dominatrix, their toughest enemy.
voices: ['Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Oikawa, Hitomi', 'Asami, Junko', 'Kanai, Mika', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Katsuki, Masako']
staff: [['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Pikabia', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Koyama, Kenji', ['Sound Effects']], ['Nishiyama, Masanori', ['Background Art']]]
